typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		Title as string,
		genresgenresgenres as string,
		Year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Year = toInteger(Year),
		Rating = toInteger(Rating)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(Year),
	AvgRating = round(avg(Rating), 2)) ~> Aggregate1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		Title,
		genresgenresgenres,
		Year_org = Year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Aggregate1, DerivedColumn2 join(Year == Year_org,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Select1 derive(Year_org = toInteger(Year_org)) ~> DerivedColumn2
Join1 sink(input(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		rating as integer,
		rotton_tomato as integer,
		avg_rate as decimal(18,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title = Title,
		genres = genresgenresgenres,
		year = Year,
		rating = Rating,
		rotton_tomato = {Rotton Tomato},
		avg_rate = AvgRating
	)) ~> sink1
